properties.areaDesc: Waters from Okaloosa-Walton County Line to Pensacola FL from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from Pensacola FL to Pascagoula MS from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 4 at 2:48PM CST until February 7 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Mobile AL
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 18 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas 6
to 11 ft expected.

* WHERE...Waters from Pensacola FL to Pascagoula MS from 20 to
60 NM and Waters from Okaloosa Walton County Line FL to
Pensacola FL from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...From 6 PM Wednesday to 9 AM CST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM WEDNESDAY TO 9 AM CST FRIDAY
